attributes.title: WORST APP EVER 😡
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to support my daddy and lord and savior trump you know #trump2020 and it took FOREVER i mean FOREVER to download the app. Im so disappointed at the app too. When it finally downloaded it started glitching SO BAD that i started having a migraine from it. This app IS HORRIBLE and needs to be SHUT DOWN it is a health hazard to anyone who downloads it.

attributes.title: Poor Excuse for an app
attributes.review: SO many issues with this App! Every time I tried opening it would glitch and I’d return to my phone screen. When it finally would load it was slow and I had to constantly close it and try again.

attributes.title: Donald trump killed my best friend
attributes.review: He sent people with corona virus to  my friend that has asthma and got him infected and he died and we can’t even go to the funeral he sent trump supporters to my house and they tried to brainwash me into forgetting but I still remember because I switched the forgetting powder with flower don’t let him get away! 😭😔😖

attributes.title: Horrible app 😢 so many glitches ✨😠
attributes.review:
Today i decided to download this wonderful app but it kept putting a orange 🍊 face😖 I got scared but it kept popping up .... HORRIBLE APP SO MANY GLITCHES ... I started crying 😭 because his ugly face kept popping up everywhere 😧. Melatonin sweetie .. break up with him already 👁👄👁 #savemelatonin2020 #savebacon2020 😜
- from abor shawn🥵💗💅🏽❤️✨

attributes.title: Dictator
attributes.review: He’s a dictator, I mean we all knew that. He’s a blind president and all his supporters are also blind, they don’t see all the stupid stuff that’s he’s doing and a person in their right mind would never support that. This app is just another way of making you blind and his supporters even more blinded. 🍊

attributes.title: Squirt me babe😘🥳✨🧚🏻‍♀️
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded the app it started playing “cotton eye joe“ extremely loudly.  And YE YE dancers bursted into my home trying to murder me like cops murder black people🧚🏻‍♀️✨🤩 I was feeling some s e x u a l tension between all of us and soon enough white stuff was squirting from my phone! We did some ... things and it was so surreal! Loved it!✨🧚🏻‍♀️✨✨🤩🧚🏻‍♀️🥺👉🏻🥺👈🏻

attributes.title: What GIVES ☹️
attributes.review: So I got this app to support my FAVORITE cheeto puff. But then my phone shut down as soon as I opened it. So I used my stimulus check (which TOTALLY came in the mail) to buy a NEW phone. So I downloaded this app on THAT phone and the same thing happened. Y’all should really look into this. I just wanna support our AMAZING orange peel. 😫

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: I recently downloaded this app and found it to be very faulty and glitchy, and it also infiltrated my personal information. It won’t open, either. I can’t even imagine this man being more of a disappointment but he manages to do it just by himself everyday!

attributes.title: Sad 😔
attributes.review:
Once the app was download onto my phone it asked me if I was of age.. Why would that matter?! Are you trying to get with me trump?! Anyway then it wanted my number. Again, are you trying to get with me?! Highly inappropriate. I’m sorry Donald but I don’t like Cheetos. 
:( Unfortunately I will be deleting this app, so bummed 😥😓

attributes.title: A FAKE
attributes.review: this app is literally a scam. i downloaded so that i could stay up to date on events, but there are jump scares in it?? an orange face keeps popping up and screams for all of two seconds and then disappears like nothing happened. not family friendly, do not recommend at all.
